item.title: Bagel recipe
item.description: Bagels are not a dumpling - they are finished with dry heat. source: https://archive.nytimes.com/cityroom.blogs.nytimes.com/2010/05/28/nocturnalist-gathering-the-dumpling-family/ ![[images/bagels-eden-remix-side.jpg]] Left: batch of homemade bagels.

item.title: Just Make Work
item.description: Work - in this note I refer to art, projects, ideas, as work. The desire to do good work comes from some idea of what good work is.

item.title: Make bagels in the desert
item.description: I use this bagel recipe: [[recipes/bagels|bagels]] Februrary 2023, at https://mars.college/. Kif and myself few decide to build a wood-fired oven in the desert.
